description: ff. 23. 183 x 136; 155 x 115 mm. - 24 lin. 14th cen. - several samāʻ notes; on fol. 12a note by Murtaḍá al-Zabīdī. Ibn ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī mentions this collection in the biography of al-Fāriqī (Ibn ḥajar, al-Durar al-kāminah, III, 315 - d. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 741/1341), for whom it was compiled by al-Ẓāhirī (d. 696/1297: Kaḥḥālah, Muʻjam (1957-61), II, 122); cf. also ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 55. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى هدانا لاشرف شرعه ... اما بعد فانى لما رأىت اهتمام اصحاب الحدىث
author: Ẓāhirī, Jamāl al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad , 1229-1296
